name: 社會科學研究法
description: This course aims to build knowledge and skills for graduate students to conduct social research. It is designed to enable students to become informed, critical consumers of research published in their field of practice, with the goal of becoming evidence based professionals/practitioners. Ethical standards of scientific inquiry will be emphasized. Ultimately, students are expected to be able to access, critically evaluate, and appropriately conduct and utilize empirical research to inform and evaluate their work with target population.
goals: 瞭解研究相關的價值與倫理議題 Understanding relevant values and ethical issues relate to research process
了解研究結果對個人及社會所帶來的影響 Demonstrating the ability to recognize the impact of research decisions on individuals and society
運用研究技巧確認,整合並分析相關資訊以提供實務者所用 Applying skills needed to identify, synthesize, and analyze relevant information to inform practitioners in social sciences
